Question / Title (Carousel): On second thought… Don’t need it after all
So let’s get to it. Do you need AWD/4WD?
Good to know.
AWD is awesome.
No worries.
It’s not for everyone.
If you live in an area that’s hilly, has a lot of unpaved roads or where it snows or rains a lot, you’d probably dig AWD.
It can help boost traction on slippery or uneven roads.
But if none of that applies to you, then you probably don’t need it. Plus, gas mileage can be slightly better without.
So what do you think?
Cool.
We’ll add it then.
